amendment.description: An amendment numbered 70 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to clarify that a study of turbulence should include a focus on weather conditions rather than climate change since weather is the proximate cause.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to clarify that a study of turbulence should include a focus on weather conditions rather than climate change.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 227 (Roll no. 356).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Ogles.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 227 (Roll no. 356).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
